body.section: Hierarchy SharedSecret is a kind of AuthorizationToken SharedSecret is a kind of Patient

section.title: Description
section.p: This class represents additional properties of the Patient when communicating with them electronically. This class was called simply 'Patient' in the HL7 Security and Privacy DAM, the definition of which is: 'This class is intended to capture the properties of a Consenter/Client or 'Patient'. See 'Actors' specified in the Use Case Analysis for additional detail. A consenter may be the person whose preferences it represents or their designated Substitute Decision Maker (SDM).'
Renamed from PatientITUser to SharedSecret on 11/14/2014

stentry.p: This keyword/shared secret may be used by a patient to provide temporary access to their electronic health records. This attribute is required to support use case P.12 originated in Canada.
